header.title: Web Developer working with JavaScript, TypeScript and PHP

about.title:
Let’s get know
about me closer
about.text: I'm a full stack developer React.js, Next.js & Node.js with 4+ years of experience, focused on creating (and occasionally designing) exceptional digital experiences that are fast, accessible, visually appealing, and responsive. Even though I have been creating web applications for over four years, I still love it as if it was something new.

list.title: Frontend Development
list.description: I craft modern and intuitive user interfaces following web standards, optimizing performance, and guaranteeing cross-browser compatibility for an exceptional user experience.

list.title: Web Applications
list.description: I develop complete web applications (frontend + backend) that are responsive and performant using React.js, Next.js, and Node.js, while optimizing UX/UI and ensuring accessibility across all devices.

list.title: Training & Mentoring
list.description: Passionate about knowledge sharing, I provide personalized training in modern web development (React.js, JavaScript ES6+) for schools, companies, and developers looking to level up their skills.

list.name: Scanifood
list.except: ScaniFood is a SaaS solution that enables restaurants to create and share digital menus via QR codes with real-time order notifications.
list.description: ScaniFood is a SaaS solution that enables restaurants to create and share digital menus via QR codes. The platform provides real-time order notifications through Mercure, instantly informing cashiers, kitchen staff, and managers when orders are placed, ensuring smooth restaurant operations. The architecture supports multi-tenant restaurant management with role-based access control for different staff positions.

list.name: Afimey Store
list.except: Afimey Store is an e-commerce platform that allows customers to order products online.
list.description: Afimey Store is an e-commerce platform that allows customers to order products online.

list.name: My Blog
list.except: Personal blog where I publish articles and tutorials focused on frontend development, particularly React and its ecosystem.
list.description: Personal blog where I publish articles and tutorials focused on frontend development, particularly React and its ecosystem. I share my experiences, tips, and projects in the field of web development.

list.name: LVG Smart
list.except: Showcase website for LVG Smart, a Guinea-based company specializing in sanitation work.
list.description: Showcase website for LVG Smart, a Guinea-based company specializing in sanitation work, providing quality services for a clean and secure environment.

list.name: Dream Company
list.except: A modern platform that facilitates searching, renting, and buying real estate with an integrated furniture catalog.
list.description: A modern and user-friendly platform that facilitates searching, renting, and buying real estate. It also features an extensive catalog of local furniture and interior products, offering users a complete experience to furnish and decorate their living spaces.

list.name: React
list.description: React is my favorite library for building web interfaces. I've been using React for over four years, creating dynamic and elegant applications across various industries.

list.name: Next.js
list.description: Next.js is my go-to framework for production applications. I've been using it for three years to build SSR and SSG web applications with optimal performance.

list.name: Node.js
list.description: I've been using Node.js with Express.js for over two years to build robust APIs and backend services for full-stack applications.

list.name: Sadio Sangharé
list.testimonial: As passionate about web development as I am about sharing knowledge, I offer special training courses in frontend development, particularly on React.js. If you're a school or organization looking for a trainer, don't hesitate to contact me for a quick, customized program.
